safetyTips: Items are being delivered by DHL who are following all necessary precautions to protect their drivers and customers.
name: ed
address: 41 North Cross Road, East Dulwich, SE22 9ET
description: Ed has been at the heart of East Dulwich since 1999.  Ed has an eclectic feel with design-led pieces, Scandinavian homeware and unique items from around the globe. Ed also has a wide range of gifts, jewellery, fashion for men and women, candles, diffusers and hand-care products.  Ed stock a wide range of Annie Sloan Chalk Paints and waxes which can reinvent any tired looking furniture around the house.  Much stock is on our website but please do call if there is anything not there that you require.
